title: Crowding out likely to occur with which change

content.question: Crowding out is most likely to occur with which of the following changes?

choices.label: An increase in the government budget surplus
An increase in the government budget deficit
A decrease in the real interest rate
A decrease in the trade deficit

content.answer: An increase in the government budget deficit

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
